luna 0.1.0

Add event to log

Source: R/luna_log.R
log_add.Rd

Add event to log

Usage

log_add(
  event = c("action", "error", "plot"),
  action = "modelfit",
  id,
  context = NA
)

Arguments

event

type of event (action or error)

action

action type, e.g. modelfit

id

run id

context

other information, e.g. error message
